mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study(user_id, title, started_at, finished_at, count, content, views, created_at) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{title}, #{started_at}, #{finished_at}, #{count}, #{content}, #{views}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT `no`, user_id, title, started_at, finished_at, `count`, content, views, created_at FROM study WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE study SET title = #{title}, started_at = #{started_at}, finished_at = #{finished_at}, count = #{count}, content = #{content} WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT a.no, a.user_id, a.title, a.started_at, a.finished_at, a.count, a.content, a.VIEWS, cast(a.CREATED_AT as date) as created_at, count_member, cast(now() as date) as cur_date FROM study a LEFT JOIN (SELECT study_no , count(study_no) AS count_member FROM study_mate GROUP BY study_no) AS b ON a.no = b.study_no ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT * FROM study a JOIN (SELECT study_no , count(study_no) AS count_member, approve_yn AS approve_member FROM study_mate where approve_yn ='Y' GROUP BY study_no) AS b ON a.no = b.study_no WHERE a.user_id = #{user_id} AND a.finished_at > now();
